Articles.Content:
every time i launch a rocket, i dont even have 100 fuel in every fuel tank even the not modded ones.

i have 86 mods and the problem showed complety random.

game version is 1.8.1, i dont know how to post logs here

You don't post anything here, you put it somewhere else on the Internet and then post a link here.

Regarding the problem, you mean your fuel tanks are empty on the launchpad? Are they empty in the VAB? If you right click a tank it will tell you how much LF and O are in it.

Post a list of your mods and maybe one will stick out. Any mod that changes fuel tanks in general is suspect though.
i dont have a mod list, the fuel is not even near to the aspected amounts : if i place a tanks wich should contain 1250 lqds fuel and 1500 ox, it starts with only 12 and 15
